alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 8:29PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Madison, Limestone, southeastern Lauderdale, Cullman, Morgan, Lawrence and southwestern Lincoln Counties through 915 PM CDT... At 828 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Pulaski to near Smith Lake. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northwestern Huntsville, Decatur, Madison, Athens, Cullman, Hartselle, Fayetteville, Moulton, Meridianville and Redstone Arsenal. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
